channel.description: Recent content in iOS on LoopedNetwork

item.title: Ice Cubes Mastodon Client
item.description: I’ve used Mastodon off-and-on for around 5 or 6 years at this point. I’ve bounced around a handful of servers, and for a (relatively brief) period I even ran my own instance. My frequent comings and goings from Mastodon speak much more to my fleeting interest with social media than with any problems with the platform. While no software is perfect, I think Mastodon does a terrific job of what it sets out to do.
